thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com | 2 of 612
thread.title: Mrs Sharon Hayes
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Mrs Sharon Hayes

author: Mrs Sharon Hayes
title: Mrs Sharon Hayes
text:
I don't usually write reviews but I am delighted with not only the quality of the shoes but when I realised I'd bought wrong size for my daughter they were very helpful in me re-ordering.Staff at Lifestyle were friendly and helpful- I just wish all stores were as pleasant!
A pleasure to shop with and excellent choice of trainers, will definitely buy from Lifestyle Sports again!
